pullRequest.title: Fix direct return of byte binary operation in a lambda
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose
This PR fixes the issue of direct return of byte binary operation in a lambda.
An example :
public function main() {
    var fn = function () returns int {
        byte a = 255;
        return a - a;
    };
}
Fixes #22168
